author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Hey Bub' Clip for Zootopia 2, an upcoming Walt Disney Animation Studios film starring Ginnifer Goodwin and Jason Bateman. Get a new look at a slice of life in the bayou with a specific greeting in Zootopia 2, in theaters on November 26, 2025.

After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia’s history, rookie cops Judy Hopps (voice of Ginnifer Goodwin) and Nick Wilde (voice of Jason Bateman) find their partnership isn’t as solid as they thought when Chief Bogo (voice of Idris Elba) orders them to join the Partners in Crisis counseling program. But it doesn’t take long for their partnership to be put to the ultimate test when they find themselves on the twisting trail of a mystery tied to the arrival of a venomous snake in the animal metropolis. The trailer, poster and trailer stills are now available to download and share.

While Zootopia 2 introduces Gary De’Snake (voice of Ke Huy Quan), Nibbles (voice of Fortune Feimster) and quokka therapist Dr. Fuzzby (voice of Quin
title: Zootopia 2 - Official 'Hey Bub' Clip (2025) Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman

author: IGN
description:
Which of the hundreds of incredible Nintendo games are the best? Well, here at IGN, we’ve teamed up with our friends at @nintendolife  to try and answer that question. What follows is the 100 best Nintendo games of all time, based on a combination of each site’s expert opinions.

As for what qualifies to make our list? Well, the vast majority you'll see here were either developed and/or published by Nintendo itself. But there's also room for some others, those games that are synonymous with Nintendo consoles or at least a period of timed exclusivity on one of its many home devices and handhelds. For example, GTA Chinatown Wars sits at 99 despite being developed by Rockstar and arriving later on the PSP, because it had a whole nine months of being on the Nintendo DS first and was designed with the DS' stylus and second screen in mind.

From iconic Nintendo in-house series such as Super Mario, Metroid, and The Legend of Zelda, to third-party heroes who have made their home on everything
title: The 100 Best Nintendo Games of All Time - IGN + Nintendo Life Ranking

author: IGN
description: Calling all dog people! Check out the launch trailer for Sheepherds!, a co-op-enabled party game where you and your friends herd sheep as different dog breeds and meet objectives in a colorful, non-stressful environment. It's out on Steam on November 17. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3006280/Sheepherds/
title: Sheepherds! - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Stranger Things is entering its final season in the Upside Down! Since it's been awhile and season 5 is dropping in three separate batches, take a few minutes to refresh yourself on all the burning questions heading into the finale like; Which D&D monster was the one in the first season? You guys remember Barb? Why haven't Will, Mike, Dustin and Lucas just stayed away from Hawkins on account of all the death?! So here's our recap of all the important things you need to know before Season 5 of Stranger Things drops.

#IGN
title: Stranger Things Seasons 1-4 Recap

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Dead Ops Arcade! The once hidden twin stick shooter from the original Black Ops is finally back in both first and third person. This gameplay was captured in its original top down third person mode, if you want to watch the game in first person check it out here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ciOWAm2w18&t=237s

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Dead Ops Arcade 4 Third-Person Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt collaboration for Sword of Convallaria, a turn-based fantasy tactical RPG developed by XD. Players will soon be able to access content specifically from the CD Projekt Red hit action RPG The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt with Geralt of Rivera and Yennefer making an appearance. The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt collaboration is coming soon to Sword of Convallaria for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sword of Convallaria x The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description: Yeah you read that right. As you progress through the Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 campaign, you'll enocunter a boss fight of, quite literally, epic proportions. Towering over skyscrappers, Michael Rooker's character, Harper, in BLOPS 7 gets a boost in size and it's your job to take him down. How and why Michael Rooker is a giant in a Call of Duty game will need to be discovered within.
title: Giant Michael Rooker Boss Fight: COD Black Ops 7

author: IGN
description:

author: IGN
description:
Ahead of the Arknights: Endfield's second beta test, IGN's Alan Knight sat down with Light Zhong, Co-Founder and Director of HYPERGRYPH and producer on Arknights: Endfield, to get an in-depth look at the new 3D real-time strategy RPG.
In the interview, we discuss the inspiration behind the massive shift in gameplay style from the original Arknights, how players can reshape the world of Talos-II and how it ties into player progression, the AIC Factory feature, which allows players to set up automated production lines for essential items, and unveil details about the upcoming second beta test.
 
Arknights: Endfield's second Beta Test is available starting November 28th, and the game's full launch is coming to PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android in early 2026. You can learn more at endfield.gryphline.com
Presented by Arknights: Endfield #ArknightsEndfield #Endfield #EndfieldBetaTestII #HYPERGRYPH #GRYPHLINE #LightZhong #Interview #STARSET #3DRPG
title: Arknights: Endfield Producer Interview - Expanding the Arknights Universe with 3D RPG

author: IGN
description: New characters are coming to Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds as free content. Watch the latest Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds trailer to see what to expect, as NiGHTS, AiAi, and Tangle & Whisper are coming to the racing game. NiGHTS arrives in December 2025, AiAi will be available in January 2026, and Tangle & Whisper join in February 2026.
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official New Free Characters Update Trailer
